item.description:
BACKYARD GAMES
Friday, June 18, 6.p.m

Are you ready for summer fun?


Do you like outdoor and indoor games?
Do you enjoy great food and thirst-quenching cocktails?

Do you like to Dance?

Party on the lawn. Party on the terrace under the tent with a DJ to spin your favorite dance tunes

ALL ON ONE SUMMER NIGHT!!!!!

Be a participant and dress for fun, or be a spectator. Either way, you’ll have a great time and meet new people.

Do we have games!!!

Try your hand at

• Beer Pong or
• Ping Pong
• Wii
• Pop a Shot- Basketball shooting game
• Electronic Darts
• Foosball or Air Hockey
• Washer Toss
• Bocce
• Professional Frisbee

And possibly more!



What is The Ira talking about, you are wondering?


PLEASE READ BELOW THE EXCITING DETAILS!!!!


The Ira of The Ira’s Singles Events is Co- Hosting


NEW AND EXCITING CONCEPT IN THE SINGLES WORLD: A new monthly singles event that has a different theme each month, and is

FUN, ORGINAL, CREATIVE, AND BEST ALL, AN OPPORTUNITY TO

FIND A KEEPER!!

PLUS: The Drawing for the bike from Highland Bike
will be held at 8 p.m.!!!


Find a Keeper is a singles night for grownups – 40 and over --co-hosted by The Ira-
of the always-fun and welcoming The Ira’s Single Events. Yes, branching out into Western Massachusetts. A chance to meet and mingle with your next door Massachusetts Singles neighbor….( Yay - for expanding your horizons!!)

Join us to eat, drink, mingle and meet new people – maybe find the person you’ve been looking for. At the very least, you’ll have a great time in a warm, and inviting atmosphere -- all with The Ira’s own brand of personal introductions for all.

Pictures from 3/20, 4/16, 5/14 can be seen at:

http://www.theirassin...

Find a Keeper Series: http://singles.meetup... and http://singles.meetup...



THE EXCITING DETAILS BELOW:

WHEN: Friday. June 18 , 2010. 6:00 p.m.- whenever

COST: $25.

6:00- 8:00- Game Playing, Mingling, Eating, the mixing and pouring of your favorite libations

8:00- ? Now that we have eaten,played, watched, and had a few drinks, let's kick it up a notch and heat up the dance floor

Critically Acclaimed and almost known from around the world: an Awesome DJ from Marx Entertainment ( And how lucky are we?)rocking the house with your favorite tunes


WHERE: Delaney House ( In the Grand Ballroom) 1 Country Club Road, Holyoke, MA 01040. 413-532-1800 ( I can hear you now- OMG- it is so far… That is why you have a car and a GPS System, plus a friend or two to car pool with. Don’t stay at home and complain, do join)

WHERE IS THE FOOD YOU ASK?

Concept food stations ( This means more than one food station) which includes:


Potato Salad
Fresh Fruit Salad
Yogurt
Assorted Vegetables and Dip
Chips & Dip
***
* Station 2 *
Gourmet Burgers
Herb, Gorgonzola Burgers
Veggie Burger
Chicken Breast
Hot Dogs
***
Served with:
Assorted Cheeses
House Signature condiments & relishes
***
* Station 3 *
Salad Station with:
Chop Chop Salad
Caesar Salad
Spinach Salad
***
Served with Assorted Dressings
***
***
* Station 4 *
Watermelon Platter
Assorted Cookies and Brownies
***
***
* Station 5 *
Coffee Station
Coffee, Decaf & Assorted Teas





Plus- Bartenders to prepare your favorite cocktails. Cash Bar/Credit Card Bar….Lol.

For tickets, call 413-535-5077 or visit: http://www.logcabin-d...

Please also send me an email once your ticket has been purchased: mistrchrming@aol.com. Subject Line: June 18. Find a Keeper Series.
Questions: 860-604-5792. For other exciting Single Events, please see:
www.the irassinglesevents.com
item.how_to_find_us: Large Group of Singles Having Fun and Smiling. Host /Hostess will direct you to our exclusive area
item.name: The Ira- Find a Keeper Singles Event- Backyard Games, DJ, Dancing, Summer Fun!!
